data.title: Letters to Santa
data.meta_description: Dear Santa, Hello! I am Adrian, age 6. I am very good this year. Please give me a DS so I can play with my brother and sister. Also, can you give my sister Sophie one also so she can stop asking us…
data.text:
Dear Santa,

Hello! I am Adrian, age 6. I am very good this year. Please give me a DS so I can play with my brother and sister. Also, can you give my sister Sophie one also so she can stop asking us for one? Say hi for the reindeers for me!

Adrian G.

Dear Santa,

I know you are working very hard in the Nort pole for you can go and leave presnts. You may have alot of things to do in christmas santa. How have you been santa?

Do over there in the nort pole is very, very coold? How have they bind the raindeers? And I wonder how many house you need to go.

Santa I already put the christmas tree on. I put alot of lights and spheres to. I thing you are very busy doing in the North pole alot of gifts.

Santa I want a remote control car color blue. The type of car is a mustang gt. I had always want a car but they never buy me one.

Another thing is that I want a game for the playstation2. And I want a bycicle color orange.

Cesar Luna

Dear Santa,

All I want for Christmas is a million dollars but, I know you can’t get that so I’ll settle for a minutre yorkie. I’ve always wanted one but they are always so expensive. If you can get me that I can asure you I will be grateful.

I’d also like a bycicle. I want one because my last one was stolen. Please bring me a helmet because I can asure you I’m going to need it!

The last thing on my Christmas list is snow. I’ve never seen snow unless the fake one counts! I’d love just for it to snow one single day. At least enough so I can play in it.

If you can deliver these things please do so! I know its alot to ask for. I’d really would appreciate it. Best wishes for your long ravel.

Sincerely, Cassandra Luna
